name: Pocket PowerPoint Presentation
summary: A PPV file contains a slide show presentation created by Microsoft Pocket PowerPoint, a version of PowerPoint for Microsoft Pocket PC. It stores a presentation, which may include formatted text, bullet points, images, transitions, and sound effects. PPV files are similar to .PPT files but do not support as many presentation features.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Can only be opened on Windows CE devices
